Paragraph: The V OC values of the devices are around 0.5 V , suggesting that the addition of the thienyl units does not affect the main chain distortion.

Let's think step by step.

| V OC values of the devices |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| V OC values of the devices (implicit: devices with thienyl units) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The V OC values of the devices are around 0.5 V , suggesting that the addition of the thienyl units does not affect the main chain distortion.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V OC values |
| devices' V OC values |
| around 0.5 V |
| addition of thienyl units |
| main chain distortion |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| devices' V OC values |
| around 0.5 V |
| main chain distortion |

Note: "VOC" stands for Voltage at Open Circuit, which is a material property. Therefore, "devices' VOC values" and "around 0.5 V" are valid entities. "Thienyl units" do not clearly refer to a material property, so they were removed.
